amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate concerning comparative effectiveness studies.

action.text: Amendment SA 154, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 154 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 154 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S2941-2942, S2943) To express the sense of the Senate concerning comparative effectiveness studies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 154 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 154 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Clinton.
